query:
ALTER TABLE quotations 
ADD COLUMN includesTax BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER finalAmount,
ADD COLUMN taxRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 15.00 AFTER includesTax,
ADD COLUMN taxAmount DECIMAL(15,2) AFTER taxRate;
